properties.description: Adds Crusader influence and a new Crusader modifier to a rare item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a high-level rare item with no influence to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.

properties.description: Adds Hunter influence and a new Hunter modifier to a rare item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a high-level rare item with no influence to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.

properties.description: Adds Redeemer influence and a new Redeemer modifier to a rare item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a high-level rare item with no influence to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.

properties.description: Adds Warlord influence and a new Warlord modifier to a rare item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a high-level rare item with no influence to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.

properties.description:
Destroys an item, applying its influence to another of the same item class
The second item is reforged as a rare item with both influence types and new modifiers
properties.directions: Right click this item, then left click the item you wish to take the influence from, then left click an item of the same item class you wish to apply it to.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you use an Orb of Chance
on an item which can become Unique to ensure it does so
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you use a Chromatic Orb
on an item to make 1-3 Sockets become White
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you reach 25% of Life
to grant 75% chance to Avoid Damage from Hits for 4 seconds
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you reach 25% of Life
to grant Adrenaline for 10 seconds
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you reach 25% of Life
to grant Shade Form for 3 seconds
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you reach 25% of Life
to cause 100% of Damage taken to be Recouped as Life for 4 seconds
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you reach 25% of Life
to Refill all Flasks
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you Die
to create a Portal to Town
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you Die
to add 300% of lost Experience to Gems
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you Die
to make each nearby enemy permanently take 25% more Damage
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you Die
to prevent 75% of Experience loss
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you use an Orb of Fusing
on an item to ensure maximum Links
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you use a Jeweller's Orb
on an item to ensure maximum Sockets
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you level up
to grant 100% increased Experience gained for 60 seconds
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you level up
to grant Soul Eater for 5 minutes
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.description:
Will be Consumed when you level up
to create an Acceleration Shrine
properties.directions: Each player can only consume one Omen in each combat area.

properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an armour to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity armours. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Unpredictably raise the strength of one Searing Exarch or Eater of Worlds modifier on an item and lower the strength of another
Lesser modifiers that have their strength lowered will be removed
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a non-unique item to apply it. Can only be used on items that have both a Searing Exarch and an Eater of Worlds implicit modifier. The chance of raising or lowering a modifier depends on its relative strength.

properties.description: Removes all modifiers from an item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click on a magic or rare item to apply it.

properties.description: Corrupts an item, modifying it unpredictably
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an item to corrupt it. Corrupted items cannot be modified again.

properties.description: Corrupts the Essences trapping a monster, modifying them unpredictably
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a monster trapped by Essences to corrupt them. Corrupted Essences cannot be modified again.

properties.description:
If The Searing Exarch is dominant, add a prefix modifier
If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, add a suffix modifier
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a rare item with The Searing Exarch or The Eater of Worlds dominance to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.

properties.description:
Adds a Lesser Searing Exarch implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Eater of Worlds implicit modifiers
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.

properties.description:

properties.description: Destroys an Anointed Item to recover one of the Oils that was used to apply that Anointment
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an Anointed item to destroy it.

properties.description: Improves the quality of a flask
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a flask to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity flasks. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description: Fracture a random modifier on a rare item with at least 4 modifiers, locking it in place
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Influenced, Synthesised or Fractured items.
A stack of 20 shards becomes a Fracturing Orb.

properties.description: Improves the quality of a gem
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a gem to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description: Upgrades The Flow Untethered to a more powerful version
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an applicable Harbinger unique item to upgrade it.

properties.description: Upgrades The Tempest's Binding to a more powerful version
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an applicable Harbinger unique item to upgrade it.

properties.description: Upgrades The Fracturing Spinner to a more powerful version
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an applicable Harbinger unique item to upgrade it.

properties.description: Upgrades The Unshattered Will to a more powerful version
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an applicable Harbinger unique item to upgrade it.

properties.description: Upgrades The Enmity Divine to a more powerful version
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an applicable Harbinger unique item to upgrade it.

properties.description: Upgrades The Rippling Thoughts to a more powerful version
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an applicable Harbinger unique item to upgrade it.

properties.description:
Adds or replaces an enchantment on a body armour
This may reforge the body armour's sockets
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click on the item you wish to modify.

properties.description:
Adds or replaces an enchantment on a weapon
This may reforge the weapon's sockets
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click on the item you wish to modify.

properties.description: Unpredictably adds or removes a modifier on a corrupted rare item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a corrupted rare item to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.

properties.description: Randomises the quality of a corrupted armour
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a corrupted armour to apply it. The maximum random quality is 29%.

properties.description: Unpredictably either reforges a corrupted rare item with new random modifiers or removes all of its modifiers
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a corrupted rare item to apply it.

properties.description: Unpredictably reforges the colour of sockets on a corrupted item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a corrupted socketed item to apply it.

properties.description: Unpredictably adds or removes a link to the largest group of linked sockets on a corrupted item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a corrupted socketed item to apply it.

properties.description: Unpredictably adds or removes a socket on a corrupted item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a corrupted socketed item to apply it.

properties.description: Unpredictably raises or lowers the tier of each modifier on a corrupted rare item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a corrupted rare item to apply it.

properties.description: Unpredictably either upgrades a corrupted item to unique rarity or destroys it
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a corrupted item to apply it. Cannot apply to Maps.

properties.description: Randomises the quality of a corrupted weapon
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a corrupted weapon to apply it. The maximum random quality is 29%.

properties.description:
Allows an item to foresee the result of the next Currency item used on it
Modifying the item in any way removes the ability to foresee
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an item to apply it.

properties.description: Identifies an item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an unidentified item to apply it.
A stack of 5 fragments becomes a Scroll of Wisdom.

properties.description:
Restores an imprinted item onto the original
Can't be applied to Fractured Items
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click on the imprinted original item to restore its modifiers. An imprint cannot be dropped or traded to other players.

properties.description:
Creates an imprint of an item for later restoration
The imprint can't be applied to Fractured Items
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click on an item to create an imprint. This imprint can later be used to restore this specific item to that imprinted state.
Sacrifice this item on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Sacrificial Heart to transform it.
Sacrifice this item on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Soul Catcher to transform it.
Sacrifice this item on the Altar of Sacrifice along with any Tempered Flesh, Tempered Spirit or Tempered Mind to transform it.
Sacrifice this item on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Story of the Vaal to transform it.
Sacrifice this item on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Mask of the Spirit Drinker to transform it.
Sacrifice this item on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Dance of the Offered to transform it.
Sacrifice this item on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Coward's Chains to transform it.
Sacrifice this item on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Apep's Slumber to transform it.
Sacrifice this item on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Architect's Hand to transform it.

properties.description:
Adds an enchantment to a utility flask that will cause
it to be used when certain conditions are met
Replaces any existing enchantment
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a flask to apply it.

properties.description: Stores a Beast in an item
properties.directions: Right click on this item then left click on a Beast in your Menagerie to itemise the Beast.

properties.description: Stores a Sextant Modifier in an item
properties.directions: Right click on this item then left click on a Voidstone to itemise an applied Sextant Modifier.
Right click on this item then left click on a Voidstone to apply the itemised Sextant Modifier to the Voidstone.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Attack modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Attribute modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Caster modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Critical modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Defence modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Elemental Damage modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Physical and Chaos Damage modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Resistance modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Life and Mana modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Adds quality that enhances Speed modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a ring, amulet or belt to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity jewellery. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description:
Applies a random quality type and amount of quality to a Corrupted ring, amulet or belt
Replaces other quality types
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a Corrupted ring, amulet or belt to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description: Adds an enchantment to an item, or replaces an existing enchantment
properties.directions: Left click on the skull and then left click on the item you wish to modify.
Can be placed in the Divine Font to allow enchantment of corrupted gloves, boots, helmets or belts.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Eternal Emblem.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Karui Emblem.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Maraketh Emblem.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Templar Emblem.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Vaal Emblem.

properties.description: Improves the quality of a map
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a map to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity maps. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description: Randomises the values of the random modifiers on an item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a magic, rare or unique item to apply it.

properties.description: Grants a passive skill refund point
properties.directions: Right click on this item to use it.
Trade coins to Cadiro Perandus.

properties.description: Creates a portal to town
properties.directions: Right click on this item to use it.
These can be brought to Tujen to refresh his vendor inventory.
These can be brought to Rog to refresh his vendor inventory.
These can be brought to Gwennen to refresh her vendor inventory.
These can be brought to Dannig to refresh his vendor inventory.

properties.description: Removes a random modifier from an item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click on a magic or rare item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Annulment.

properties.description: Randomises the numeric values of base defences on an armour
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an armour to apply it.

properties.description: Randomises the values of the implicit modifiers of an item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click another item to apply it.

properties.description: Reforges a magic item with new random modifiers
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alteration.

properties.description: Reforges a map item as another of the same tier
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a map to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Horizons.

properties.description: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes a Chaos Orb.

properties.description:
Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers, including a Veiled modifier
Can only be used on items that can have a Veiled modifier
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it.

properties.description: Change the type of quality of a skill gem with quality to another random quality
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a skill gem to apply it.

properties.description: Reforges the colour of sockets on an item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it.

properties.description: Reforges the links between sockets on an item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it. The item's quality increases the chances of obtaining more links.

properties.description: Reforges the number of sockets on an item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it. The item's quality increases the chances of obtaining more sockets.

properties.description: Change the type of quality of a support gem with quality to another random quality
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a support gem to apply it.

properties.description: Reforges a unique equipment as another of the same item class
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a unique item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Ancient Orb.

properties.description: Downgrades a map on the Atlas
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a shaped map on the atlas to downgrade it. You can then earn the Shaper's Orb again to reshape another map afterwards.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Ritual Vessel.

properties.description: Stores the monsters slain for the first time from a completed Ritual Altar for future use
properties.directions: Right-click this item then left-click a Ritual Altar to store the monsters from the completed Ritual in this item. Cannot be used on a Ritual in a map opened with a Blood-Filled Vessel.

properties.description: Uncompletes any map on the Atlas
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click any map on the Atlas to apply it.

properties.description: Uncompletes a white map on the Atlas
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a white map on the Atlas to apply it.

properties.description: Uncompletes a yellow or white map on the Atlas
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a yellow or white map on the Atlas to apply it.
Trade this in to Siosa inside the Library for a Skill Gem

properties.description: Improves the quality of a Strongbox
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a Strongbox to apply it. Has greater effect on lower rarity Strongboxes. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description: Greatly improves the quality and rewards of a Strongbox and strengthens its defenders
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a Strongbox to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Engineer's Orb.

properties.description:
Removes one Influenced Modifier from an item with at least two Influenced
Modifiers and upgrades another Influenced Modifier
Upgrading a modifier of the highest tier transforms the
modifier into an Elevated Modifier
Attempting to upgrade an Elevated Modifier rerolls its values
Can be used on Body Armours, Boots, Gloves and Helmets
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click an item with at least two Influenced Modifiers to apply it.

properties.description: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it. Current modifiers are retained and a new one is added.
A stack of 20 shards becomes a Regal Orb.

properties.description: Reforges a map item as another of a higher tier
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a map to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes a Harbinger's Orb.

properties.description: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.

properties.description: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Transmutation.

properties.description: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.

properties.description: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item with up to four linked sockets
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Binding.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alchemy.

properties.description: Contains a Mysterious Map with a Foil Unique Reward
properties.directions: Right click to open.

properties.description: Improves the quality of a weapon
properties.directions: Right click this item then left click a weapon to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity weapons. The maximum quality is 20%.

properties.description: Destroys two Sentinels to create a fully-charged Sentinel with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably, with a higher chance of new random modifiers
properties.directions: Right click this item then select two Sentinels to combine.

properties.description: Destroys two Armours to create a new Armour with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably
properties.directions: Right click this item then select two Armours to combine. These items must be of the same item class.

properties.description: Destroys two Sentinels to create a fully-charged Sentinel with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably
properties.directions: Right click this item then select two Sentinels to combine.

properties.description: Destroys two Jewellery items to create a new Jewellery item with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably
properties.directions: Right click this item then select two Jewellery items to combine. These items must be of the same item class.

properties.description: Destroys two Sentinels to create a fully-charged Sentinel with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably, with a higher chance of a special base type
properties.directions: Right click this item then select two Sentinels to combine.

properties.description: Destroys two Sentinels to create a fully-charged Sentinel with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably, with a higher chance of a upgrading the tier of modifiers
properties.directions: Right click this item then select two Sentinels to combine.

properties.description: Destroys two Weapons or Quivers to create a new Weapon or Quiver with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably
properties.directions: Right click this item then select two Weapons or Quivers to combine. These items must be of the same item class.

properties.description:
Creates a portal to the Rogue Harbour from a Town or Hideout
